title: Cost Cost Reports
content:
Cloud Cost Reports provide a comprehensive set of prebuilt report pages that help you analyze cloud spending across AWS, Azure, and OCI. After you upload the Cloud Cost Reports package to Operations Platform, these reports appear under the FinOps Dashboard in Operations Cloud.

The prebuilt reports help you:

  • Understand multi-cloud spending at a glance

  • Drill down into provider-specific cost categories

  • Identify high-cost accounts, subscriptions, products, or regions

  • Detect anomalies and potential overspend

  • Analyze compute, storage, database, and data transfer patterns

View Cloud Cost Reports

Users with the DefaultBVDRole or bvd_admin role in Operations Cloud can view Cloud Cost Reports.

To view Cloud Cost Reports:

  1. Log in to Operations Cloud.

  2. Click Menu   to open the side navigation panel. You will see FinOps Dashboard.

  3. Expand the FinOps Dashboard. It contains four report categories:

  • Multi-Cloud Spend

  • AWS Cloud Spend

  • Azure Cloud Spend

  • OCI Cloud Spend

Each category groups related reports. Expand a category to view the individual report pages.

Multi-Cloud Spend

The Multi-Cloud Summary report is available under Multi-Cloud Spend.

Multi-Cloud Summary

Shows consolidated multi-cloud cost across AWS, Azure, and OCI, including total cost, compute insights, and storage usage trends.

It includes the following widgets:

  • Multi-Cloud Summary - Introduces the report and provides interpretation context.
  • Cost by Cloud Provider (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost trends across cloud providers over the past six months.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) -  Shows cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end cost based on current trends.
  • Compute Summary - Introduces compute insights.
  • AWS Effective Savings Rates (Last 90 Days) - Shows how efficiently AWS savings programs were used over the past 90 days.
  • Azure Effective Savings Rates (Last 90 Days) - Shows how efficiently Azure savings programs were used over the past 90 days.
  • AWS EC2 Instances (Current Month) -  Shows the number of active AWS compute instances this month.
  • Azure Virtual Machines (Current Month) - Shows the number of active Azure virtual machines this month.
  • Compute Cost by Cloud Provider (Last 6 Months) - Shows compute cost trends across providers over the past six months.
  • Average Cost per Compute Hour (Current Month) - Shows average compute cost per hour this month for each provider.
  • Compute Hours (Current Month) - Shows total compute hours consumed across providers this month.
  • Object Storage Summary - Introduces object storage insights.
  • Amortized Storage Cost by Cloud Provider (Last 6 Months) - Shows storage cost trends across providers over the past six months.
  • Average Cost per GB (Current Month) - Shows the average object storage cost per GB across providers this month.
  • Object Storage (Current Month) - Shows total object storage usage across providers this month.

AWS Cloud Spend

The following reports are available under AWS Cloud Spend:

  • AWS Billing Executive Summary
  • AWS Compute Summary
  • AWS S3 Summary
  • AWS Data Transfer Summary
  • AWS Database Summary

AWS Billing Executive Summary

Shows AWS cost trends across accounts, products, regions, and charge types, highlighting key cost drivers and efficiency indicators.

It includes the following widgets:

  • AWS Billing Executive Summary - Introduces the report.

  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total AWS cost from the previous month.

  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows AWS cost accumulated so far this month.

  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end cost based on current trends.

  • Effective Savings Rate (Last 90 Days) - Shows how efficiently AWS savings programs were used over the past 90 days.

  • Cost (Current Month Daily Average) - Shows the average daily cost for this month.

  • Active Accounts (Current Month) - Shows the number of AWS accounts with billable activity this month.

  • Cost (Last 6 Months) - Shows AWS cost trends over the past six months.

  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 accounts contributing most to cost this month.

  • Cost by Product (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost trends across AWS products over the past six months.

  • Cost by Charge Type (Last 6 Months) - Shows how costs are distributed across charge types over the past six months.

  • Cost by Region (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost across regions over the past six months.

  • Cost by Product Family (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 product families contributing most to cost this month.

AWS Compute Summary

Shows compute-related cost across AWS compute services and highlights key drivers such as instance families, regions, and pricing terms.

It includes the following widgets:

  • AWS Compute Summary - Introduces the report and compute scope.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total compute cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows compute cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end compute cost based on current trends.
  • Effective Savings Rate (Last 90 Days) - Shows how efficiently compute savings programs were used over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Previous Month) -  Shows the top 10 accounts with the highest compute cost last month.
  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 accounts contributing most to compute cost this month.
  • Cost by Charge Type (Last 90 Days) - Shows compute cost grouped by charge type over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Instance Type Family (Last 6 Months) - Shows compute cost trends across instance families over the past six months.
  • Cost by Product Code (Last 90 Days) - Shows compute cost across product codes over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Region (Last 6 Months) - Shows compute cost across regions over the past six months.
  • Cost by Charge Type (Last 6 Months) - Shows compute cost grouped by charge type over the past six months.
  • Cost by Pricing Term (Last 6 Months) - Shows compute cost across pricing terms over the past six months.
  • Compute Cost Table by Product Code and Usage Account - Shows detailed compute cost entries.

AWS S3 Summary

Shows AWS S3 cost and usage patterns across accounts, buckets, and storage classes, including anomaly detection.

It includes the following widgets:
  • AWS S3 Summary - Introduces the report.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total S3 cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows S3 cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end S3 cost based on current trends.
  • Cost per GB (Current Month) - Shows storage efficiency based on cost per GB this month.
  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Previous Month) - Shows the top 10 accounts with the highest S3 cost last month.
  • Cost by Bucket (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 buckets contributing most to S3 cost this month.
  • Cost by Volume Type (Last 90 Days) - Shows S3 cost across storage classes over the past 90 days.
  • Usage by Volume Type (Last 90 Days) - Shows S3 usage across storage classes over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Region (Last 6 Months) - Shows S3 cost across regions over the past six months.
  • Anomalies - Explains the anomaly detection logic.
  • Anomalies by Bucket (Chart and Table) - Shows buckets with detected cost spikes.

AWS Data Transfer Summary

Shows AWS data transfer cost, including daily transfer trends and high-transfer accounts.

It includes the following widgets:
  • AWS Data Transfer Summary - Introduces the report.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total data transfer cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows data transfer cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end data transfer cost based on current trends.
  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Previous Month) - Shows the top 10 accounts with the highest data transfer cost last month.
  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 accounts contributing most to data transfer cost this month.
  • Cost by Data Transfer Type (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost across transfer types over the past six months.
  • Data Transfer Daily GB per Product Name (Last 90 Days) - Shows daily transfer volume per product over the past 90 days.
  • Data Transfer Daily GB per Operation (Last 90 Days) - Shows daily transfer volume by operation type over the past 90 days.

AWS Database Summary

Shows cost and usage patterns across AWS database services.

It includes the following widgets:

  • AWS Databases Summary - Introduces the report.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total database cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows database cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end database cost based on current trends.
  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Previous Month) - Shows the top 10 accounts with the highest database cost last month.
  • Cost by Account (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 accounts contributing most to database cost this month.
  • Cost by Charge Type (Last 90 Days) - Shows database cost grouped by charge type over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Database Engine (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost trends across database engines over the past six months.
  • Cost by Product Code (Last 90 Days) - Shows database cost across product codes over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Region (Last 6 Months) - Shows database cost across regions over the past six months.
  • Cost by Instance Family (Last 90 Days) - Shows cost across different instance families over the past 90 days.

Azure Cloud Spend

The following reports are available under Azure Cloud Spend:

  • Azure Billing Executive Summary
  • Azure Compute Summary
  • Azure Blob Storage Summary

Azure Billing Executive Summary

Shows Azure spending across subscriptions, service families, pricing models, and regions.

It includes the following widgets:

  • Azure Billing Executive Summary - Introduces the report.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total Azure cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows Azure cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end cost based on current trends.
  • Effective Savings Rate (Last 90 Days) - Shows how effectively Azure savings programs were used over the past 90 days.
  • Cost (Current Month Daily Average) - Shows the average daily cost for this month.
  • Active Subscriptions (Current Month) - Shows the number of subscriptions with billable activity this month.
  • Cost (Last 6 Months) - Shows Azure cost trends over the past six months.
  • Cost by Subscription (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 subscriptions contributing most to cost this month.
  • Cost by Consumed Service (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost across service categories over the past six months.
  • Cost by Pricing Model (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost distribution across pricing models over the past six months.
  • Cost by Location (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost across regions over the past six months.
  • Cost by Service Family (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the highest-cost service families this month.

Azure Compute Summary

Shows Azure compute cost across VM series, subscriptions, and regions.

It includes the following widgets:

  • Azure Compute Summary - Introduces compute insights.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total compute cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows compute cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end compute cost based on current trends.
  • Effective Savings Rate (Last 90 Days) - Shows how effectively compute savings programs were used over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Subscription (Top 10 for Previous Month) - Shows the top 10 subscriptions with the highest compute cost last month.
  • Cost by Subscription (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 subscriptions contributing most to compute cost this month.
  • Cost by Pricing Model (Last 90 Days) - Shows the distribution of compute cost across pricing models for the past 90 days.
  • Cost by VM Series (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost trends across VM series over the past six months.
  • Cost by Charge Type (Last 6 Months) - Shows compute cost grouped by charge type over the past six months.
  • Cost by Location (Last 6 Months) - Shows compute cost across regions over the past six months.
  • Compute Cost Table by Meter Category - Shows detailed compute cost entries.

Azure Blob Storage Summary

Shows Azure Blob Storage cost and usage patterns, including anomalies across storage types and subscriptions.

It includes the following widgets:

  • Azure Blob Storage Summary - Introduces the report.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total blob storage cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows blob storage cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Current Month Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end blob storage cost based on current trends.
  • Cost per GB (Current Month) - Shows storage efficiency based on cost per GB this month.
  • Cost by Subscription (Top 10 for Previous Month) - Shows the top 10 subscriptions with the highest blob storage cost last month.
  • Cost by Subscription (Top 10 for Current Month) - Shows the top 10 subscriptions contributing most to blob storage cost this month.
  • Cost by Storage Account (Top 10, Last 90 Days) - Shows the storage accounts with the highest blob storage cost over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Storage Type (Last 90 Days) - Shows cost distribution across storage types over the past 90 days.
  • Usage by Storage Type (Last 90 Days) - Shows storage usage across storage types over the past 90 days.
  • Cost by Location (Last 6 Months) - Shows blob storage cost across regions over the past six months.
  • Anomalies - Explains the anomaly detection logic.
  • Anomalies by Storage Account (Top 10 and Last 90 Days) (Chart and Table) - Shows storage accounts with detected cost anomalies.

OCI Cloud Spend

The following reports are available under OCI Cloud Spend:

  • OCI Data Exploration

  • OCI Billing Executive Summary

  • OCI Cloud Tags

OCI Data Exploration

Shows OCI cost by compartment and service.

It includes the following widgets:

  • Filtering - Introduces filtering options.
  • Cost Total (Time Range) - Shows total cost for the selected period.
  • Cost by Compartment (Time Range) - Shows cost distribution across compartments.
  • Cost by Service (Time Range) - Shows cost across service categories.
  • Cost Details (Table) - Shows detailed cost entries.

OCI Billing Executive Summary

Shows overall OCI cost trends across compartments, regions, and services.

It includes the following widgets:

  • EXECUTIVE: BILLING SUMMARY - OCI - Introduces the report.
  • Cost (Previous Month) - Shows total OCI cost from the previous month.
  • Cost (Current Month) - Shows OCI cost accumulated so far this month.
  • Cost (Forecasted) - Projects expected month-end OCI cost based on current trends.
  • Cost (Last 6 Months) - Shows OCI cost trends over the past six months.
  • Cost by Compartment Name (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost across compartments over the past six months.
  • Cost by Region (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost across regions over the past six months.
  • Cost by Product Service (Last 6 Months) - Shows cost across product services over the past six months.

OCI Cloud Tags

Shows tag-based cost allocation and helps identify untagged spend.

It includes the following widgets:

  • Tag Explorer - Introduces tag-based insights.
  • Tagged Resources - Introduces tagged-resource insights.
  • Tagged Resource Count - Shows the number of tagged resources.
  • Tagged Resource Cost - Shows total cost associated with tagged resources.
  • Resource Count by Tag - Shows how resources are distributed across tags.
  • Cost by Tag - Shows how cost is distributed across tags.
  • Tag Metrics - Shows detailed tag-level information.
  • Untagged Resources - Explains cost implications of untagged resources.
  • Untagged Resources Count - Shows the number of untagged resources.
  • Untagged Resources Cost - Shows total cost associated with untagged resources.
  • Untagged Resources (Table) - Shows detailed information about untagged resources.

Create custom report

You must have the bvd_admin role to create your own reports.

To learn how to create your own reports, see Create a Flex report. Use the FinOps_schema (.xlsx) included in the Cloud Cost Reports package when building new predefined queries for custom reports.
